faq_templates.title: Sample email to landlord about dog run access
faq_templates.body:
Hello [Landlord Name],
I live in [unit] and would like to request access to use the building's common area for dog walking at scheduled times. Please advise procedures...

faq_templates.title: Complaint template for off-leash dog near playground
faq_templates.body:
To Whom It May Concern,
I witnessed a dog off-leash in a children's playground at [location] at [time]...
